# Richmond Airport (Queensland)

| pushpin_map = Queensland
| pushpin_label = YRMD
| pushpin_map_caption = Location in Queensland
| metric-rwy = y
| r1-number = 09/27
| r1-length-m = 1,524
| r1-surface = Asphalt
| footnotes = Sources: Australian AIP and aerodrome chart
}}
Richmond Airport  is 2 miles northwest of Richmond, Queensland, Australia. It is operated by the Richmond Shire Council.
Facilities
The airport is  above sea level and has one asphalt runway, 09/27,  long.
Airlines and destinations
See also
* List of airports in Queensland
